title: What Breaks a Man?: Sensible Hearts Part 2
description: This sequel to What Makes a Man? navigates a life that can break a man. There’s a difference between bad guys, and good guys that do bad things. Stuck on a similar path from his sordid past, Dom’s intentions are pure but his ideas are not. He’s struggling to find himself in the right situation for the right reasons. When his saints all become sinners, he’s not sure what he should stand for anymore. And the life he can’t back away from starts to break him down.
author: H.Q. Frost
